title: How I Pass My Tests
author: Anonymous
citation: Anonymous. "How I Pass My Tests: experience with Drug Testing & Cannabis (ID 47726)". Erowid.org. Jun 25, 2007. erowid.org/exp/47726
report:
I have been a regular marijuana smoker for many years and the only time I ever failed a drug test was when I bought one of those cleansing drinks. The most effective method I've found is just coffee and a fist full of vitamins.

I work with juvenile delinquents and drug testing is mandatory for almost every job I've had. I refrain from smoking for a day or two( just to be cautious), drink a pot or 2 of coffee and eat some vitamins, and make sure Im peeing every 15-20 minutes, and pee right before my test (I usually go right beside my car in the parking lot before I go in). It's always worked for me.
